sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
uncertain about something
, ne ve, kaj naj naredi.

seg.quote: She hesitated, uncertain whether to continue.
They looked at each other uncertainly.

sense.def:
Nekaj v prihodnosti je
uncertain
, kadar nihče ne ve, kaj se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: The outcome of his case was uncertain.

sense.def:
Kadar je vzrok nečesa
uncertain
, nihče ne ve, zakaj se je tisto zgodilo.

seg.quote: The cause of death remains uncertain.
